vocabulary.name: AttendedOrDNA
vocabulary.Description: Attended or DNA: (This table is used by NHS ITK specification in UK only) Table type: User

concept.displayName: Did not attend - no advance warning given
Appointment cancelled or postponed by the Health Care Provider
Patient arrived on time or, if late, before the relevant health care professional was ready to see them
Patient arrived late, after the relevant health care professional was first ready to see them, but was seen
Patient arrived late and could not be seen
